resources.string: Beat Blocks is a rhythm-puzzle game where you put your skills to the test in order to achieve the top score.
\u2022 Make matches of 3 or more to remove a block and gain points.
\u2022 To make a successful move you must move a block while a beat is in the accepting region of the beat map.
\u2022 If you miss 3 beats it\'s game over!
